resources.string: %1$s v%2$d by Arno den Hond Â© 2016
This app only provides a launcher shortcut to show the instructions below.

Send Text to any app that can send text.
Usage Instructions:

Edit the Quick Settings Tiles and add Send Text

Select the Send Text Tile and type the text in the notification

Select the app or contact to send the text to
Press back to close this screen.
Launcher disabled. Restart required on some devices.
